decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing cheap spells and card draw to consistently bring out Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard. By casting multiple spells in a turn, players can bring back Arclight Phoenix as a powerful threat. The inclusion of Fiery Impulse, Lightning Axe, and Treasure Cruise helps to fill up the graveyard quickly while maintaining board control. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Spell Pierce to protect the combo. Overall, the deck aims to be aggressive and explosive, leveraging the recursive nature of Arclight Phoenix to overwhelm opponents.
